alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mississippi and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caraway, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Caraway, Luxora, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Dell, Burdette, Fulton, Little River, Etowah, Victoria, Three Way, West Ridge, Eastview, Lennie, Vail, Grider, Hightower, Tuckertown and Rosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
